title: Pasta with paprika and bacon
content:
This is a simple pasta dish. You only need few ingredients and it can be done in 15 minutes. 

Ingredients:

  • Bacon
  • Pasta
  • Paprika
  • Salt and Pepper

How to make:

  1. Boil the pasta. 
  2. Cut bacon, fry in the pan.
  3. Cut paprika into cubes.
  4. Mix everything together. Add salt and pepper to taste.
